attributes.additional_details: To enable a quicker response to the growing pressure on the NHS hospitals, reduce the increasing deaths and serious illness, reduce the impact on the economy and prevent further government debt. Coordinate this policy on the approval of the Oxford AstraZeneca vaccine.
attributes.background: Debate ASAP the introduction of a 24 hour vaccination programme throughout the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565197
